markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

You have learned from the brute destructive power of [xulgaths](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) and their kind. You make a melee Strike that ignores any resistances the target has. If you target a solid unattended object or surface with your Strike, you might automatically destroy it without an attack roll. If you target any object or surface with Hardness 20 or less that isn't a magic item or the effect of a spell, you destroy it. If the target object or surface is a magic item or the effect of a spell, you attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it using your attack bonus with the Strike for the counteract check. On a successful counteract check, you destroy the object or surface unless it has Hardness greater than 20, is an artifact, or is similarly difficult to destroy. You destroy up to a 5-foot cube of an object or surface larger than Medium.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
name: Annihilating Swing
